content:
ServiceConfiguration Class

In this Article

Represents a configurable property for the service.

Syntax

Declaration

public class ServiceConfiguration

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • ServiceConfiguration

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Properties summary

Authentication

Gets the service authentication behavior.
Authorization

Gets the authorization behavior for the service.
BaseAddresses

Gets the base addresses used by the service.
CloseTimeout

Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service to close.
Credentials

Gets the service credential.
Description

Gets the service description.
IdentityConfiguration

Gets or sets the identity configuration for the service.
OpenTimeout

Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service to open.
UseIdentityConfiguration

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service uses identity configuration.

Methods summary

AddServiceEndpoint(ServiceEndpoint)

Adds the specified service endpoint to the configuration service.
AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,String)

Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, and endpoint address.
AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,Uri)

Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, and URI that contains the endpoint address.
AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,String,Uri)

Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, endpoint address and URI that contains the address at which it listens.
AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,Uri,Uri)

Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with the specified contract, binding, and URIs that contain the endpoint and listening addresses.
EnableProtocol(Binding)

Enables a binding protocol with the service endpoint.
LoadFromConfiguration()

Loads a configuration from the current service configuration.
LoadFromConfiguration(Configuration)

Loads the configuration from the current service configuration.
SetEndpointAddress(ServiceEndpoint,String)

Sets the endpoint address of the specified endpoint to the specified address.

Properties

  • Authentication

    Gets the service authentication behavior.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior Authentication { get; }

    Property Value

    • ServiceAuthenticationBehavior

      The service authentication behavior.

  • Authorization

    Gets the authorization behavior for the service.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthorizationBehavior Authorization { get; }

    Property Value

    • ServiceAuthorizationBehavior

      The authorization behavior for the service.

  • BaseAddresses

    Gets the base addresses used by the service.

    public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<Uri> BaseAddresses { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlyCollection<Uri>

      The base addresses for the service.

  • CloseTimeout

    Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service to close.

    public TimeSpan CloseTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The timespan that specifies the interval of time allowed for the service to close.

  • Credentials

    Gets the service credential.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials Credentials { get; }

    Property Value

    • ServiceCredentials

      The service credential.

  • Description

    Gets the service description.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription Description { get; }

    Property Value

    • ServiceDescription

      The service description.

  • IdentityConfiguration

    Gets or sets the identity configuration for the service.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration IdentityConfiguration { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • IdentityConfiguration

      The identity configuration for the service.

  • OpenTimeout

    Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service to open.

    public TimeSpan OpenTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The timespan that specifies the interval of time allowed for the service to open.

  • UseIdentityConfiguration

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service uses identity configuration.

    public bool UseIdentityConfiguration { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if the service uses identify configuration; otherwise, false.

Methods

  • AddServiceEndpoint(ServiceEndpoint)

    Adds the specified service endpoint to the configuration service.

    public void AddServiceEndpoint (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint);

    Parameters

    • endpoint
      ServiceEndpoint

      The service endpoint.

  • AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,String)

    Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, and endpoint address.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint AddServiceEndpoint (Type contractType, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, string address);

    Parameters

    • contractType
      Type

      The type of contract for the endpoint added.

    • binding
      Binding

      The binding for the endpoint added.

    • address
      String

      The address for the endpoint added.

    Returns

    • ServiceEndpoint

      The service endpoint added to the configuration service.

  • AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,Uri)

    Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, and URI that contains the endpoint address.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint AddServiceEndpoint (Type contractType, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, Uri address);

    Parameters

    • contractType
      Type

      The type of contract for the endpoint added.

    • binding
      Binding

      The binding for the endpoint added.

    • address
      Uri

      The Uri that contains the address for the endpoint added.

    Returns

    • ServiceEndpoint

      The service endpoint added to the configuration service.

  • AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,String,Uri)

    Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, endpoint address and URI that contains the address at which it listens.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint AddServiceEndpoint (Type contractType, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, string address, Uri listenUri);

    Parameters

    • contractType
      Type

      The type of contract implemented by the endpoint.

    • binding
      Binding

      The binding for the endpoint added.

    • address
      String

      The address for the endpoint added.

    • listenUri
      Uri

      The URI that contains the address which the endpoint listens for incoming messages.

    Returns

    • ServiceEndpoint

      The service endpoint added to the configuration service.

  • AddServiceEndpoint(Type,Binding,Uri,Uri)

    Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with the specified contract, binding, and URIs that contain the endpoint and listening addresses.

    public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint AddServiceEndpoint (Type contractType, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, Uri address, Uri listenUri);

    Parameters

    • contractType
      Type

      The type of contract implemented by the endpoint.

    • binding
      Binding

      The binding for the endpoint added.

    • address
      Uri

      The Uri that contains the address for the endpoint added.

    • listenUri
      Uri

      The Uri that contains the address at which the endpoint listens for incoming messages.

    Returns

    • ServiceEndpoint

      The service endpoint added to the configuration service.

  • EnableProtocol(Binding)

    Enables a binding protocol with the service endpoint.

    public System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> EnableProtocol (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding protocol);

    Parameters

    • protocol
      Binding

      The binding protocol.

    Returns

    • Collection<ServiceEndpoint>

      A collection of service endpoint.

  • LoadFromConfiguration()

    Loads a configuration from the current service configuration.

    public void LoadFromConfiguration ();
  • LoadFromConfiguration(Configuration)

    Loads the configuration from the current service configuration.

    public void LoadFromConfiguration (System.Configuration.Configuration configuration);

    Parameters

    • configuration
      Configuration

      The configuration.

  • SetEndpointAddress(ServiceEndpoint,String)

    Sets the endpoint address of the specified endpoint to the specified address.

    public void SetEndpointAddress (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, string relativeAddress);

    Parameters

    • endpoint
      ServiceEndpoint

      The service endpoint.

    • relativeAddress
      String

      The endpoint address.
